title: Beaded Watch Case

  shape: irregular

  materials_name: velvet (fabric weave) glass (material) metal

  techniques_name: sewing (needleworking technique) embroidering

  object_colour: multicolored

  physical_appearance: This is a beaded watch case. It is made from green velvet
 and embroided with coloured beads. It is in a shape of a leaf
 with embroided floral motifs bordering a depiction of a fruit in the center. The fruit resembles a pineapple or promegranate
 and is surrounded by several leaves.

  subject_terms_1: beadwork (visual works) plant-derived motifs Peranakan

  subject_terms_2: Beadwork Motifs Watchcases Peranakan (Asian people)

  subject_terms_3: Decorative arts

  sgcool_label_text: This watch case is embroidered with a mixture of glass seed beads and metallic beads. A pomegranate is beaded in a variety of colours
 though when treated in such a way and given a set of spikey leaves
 it was more likely to represent a pineapple
 which symbolizes windfall in a not too distant future. Metallic beads were favoured for their shimmering quality. In comparison with glass seed beads
 metallic beads were generally more expensive and produced in smaller quantities.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a beaded watch case. It is made from green velvet, and embroided with coloured beads. It is in a shape of a leaf, with embroided floral motifs bordering a depiction of a fruit in the center. The fruit resembles a pineapple or promegranate, and is surrounded by several leaves.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This watch case is embroidered with a mixture of glass seed beads and metallic beads. A pomegranate is beaded in a variety of colours, though when treated in such a way and given a set of spikey leaves, it was more likely to represent a pineapple, which symbolizes windfall in a not too distant future. Metallic beads were favoured for their shimmering quality. In comparison with glass seed beads, metallic beads were generally more expensive and produced in smaller quantities.
